net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters

Class Action0ToAsyncAction0

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters.Action0ToAsyncAction0
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action0

    public class Action0ToAsyncAction0
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action0
    An adapter that converts an Action0 to a new Action0, that makes an asynchronous calls to the original Action0 upon invocation. This adapter provides no possibility to check for the completion of the original action nor to retrieve thrown exceptions. Thus it is recommended to use Action0ToAction0Async adapter instead to achieve a similar result. All asynchronous calls are executed in another thread and forwarded to the Action0.start() method. The Executor to use for the asynchronous invocations can be chosen during creation of this adapter. If no explicit executor is given the a default executor is used. The default executor can be set using the AsyncExecutor.setDefaultExecutor(Executor) property or is created automatically by the AsyncExecutor.
    Author:
    tilmann
